default.account.followers.empty: No one follows this user yet.
default.account.follows.empty: This user doesn"t follow anyone yet.
default.account.link_verified_on: Ownership of this link was checked on {date}
default.account.locked_info: This account privacy status is set to locked. The owner manually reviews who can follow them.
default.account.requested: Awaiting approval. Click to cancel follow request
default.alert.unexpected.title: Oops!
default.boost_modal.combo: You can press {combo} to skip this next time
default.bundle_column_error.body: Something went wrong while loading this component.
default.bundle_column_error.title: Network error
default.bundle_modal_error.message: Something went wrong while loading this component.
default.column_back_button.label: Back
default.compose_form.direct_message_warning: This post will only be sent to the mentioned users.
default.compose_form.hashtag_warning: This post won"t be listed under any hashtag as it is unlisted. Only public posts can be searched by hashtag.
default.compose_form.lock_disclaimer: Your account is not {locked}. Anyone can follow you to view your follower-only posts.
default.compose_form.poll.type.hint: Click to toggle poll type. Radio button (default) is single. Checkbox is multiple.
default.compose_form.sensitive.unmarked: Media is not marked as sensitive
default.confirmations.block.message: Are you sure you want to block {name}?
default.confirmations.delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
default.confirmations.delete_list.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this list?
default.confirmations.domain_block.message: Are you really, really sure you want to block the entire {domain}? In most cases a few targeted blocks or mutes are sufficient and preferable. You will not see content from that domain in any public timelines or your notifications. Your followers from that domain will be removed.
default.confirmations.mute.message: Are you sure you want to mute {name}?
default.confirmations.redraft.message: Are you sure you want to delete this post and re-draft it? Favorites and reposts will be lost, and replies to the original post will be orphaned.
default.confirmations.reply.message: Replying now will overwrite the message you are currently composing. Are you sure you want to proceed?
default.confirmations.unfollow.message: Are you sure you want to unfollow {name}?
default.edit_profile.hints.avatar: PNG, GIF or JPG. At most 2 MB. Will be downscaled to 400x400px
default.edit_profile.hints.bot: This account mainly performs automated actions and might not be monitored
default.edit_profile.hints.header: PNG, GIF or JPG. At most 2 MB. Will be downscaled to 1500x500px
default.edit_profile.hints.locked: Requires you to manually approve followers
default.edit_profile.hints.meta_fields: You can have up to {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} displayed as a table on your profile
default.embed.instructions: Embed this post on your website by copying the code below.
default.embed.preview: Here is what it will look like:
default.emoji_button.label: Insert emoji
default.empty_column.blocks: You haven"t blocked any users yet.
default.empty_column.community: The local timeline is empty. Write something publicly to get the ball rolling!
default.empty_column.direct: You don"t have any direct messages yet. When you send or receive one, it will show up here.
default.empty_column.domain_blocks: There are no hidden domains yet.
default.empty_column.favourited_statuses: You don"t have any liked posts yet. When you like one, it will show up here.
default.empty_column.favourites: No one has liked this post yet. When someone does, they will show up here.
default.empty_column.filters: You haven"t created any muted words yet.
default.empty_column.follow_requests: You don"t have any follow requests yet. When you receive one, it will show up here.
default.empty_column.group: There is nothing in this group yet. When members of this group make new posts, they will appear here.
default.empty_column.hashtag: There is nothing in this hashtag yet.
default.empty_column.home: Your home timeline is empty! Visit {public} to get started and meet other users.
default.empty_column.list: There is nothing in this list yet. When members of this list create new posts, they will appear here.
default.empty_column.lists: You don"t have any lists yet. When you create one, it will show up here.
default.empty_column.mutes: You haven"t muted any users yet.
default.empty_column.notifications: You don"t have any notifications yet. Interact with others to start the conversation.
default.empty_column.public: There is nothing here! Write something publicly, or manually follow users from other servers to fill it up
default.fediverse_tab.explanation_box.explanatio: {site_title} is part of the Fediverse, a social network made up of thousands of independent social media sites (aka 'servers'). The posts you see here are from 3rd-party servers. You have the freedom to engage with them, or to block any server you don"t like. Pay attention to the full username after the second @ symbol to know which server a post is from. To see only {site_title} posts, visit {local}.
default.fediverse_tab.explanation_box.title: What is the Fediverse?
default.getting_started.heading: Getting started
default.getting_started.open_source_notice: {code_name} is open source software. You can contribute or report issues at {code_link} (v{code_version}).
default.group.members.empty: This group does not has any members.
default.group.removed_accounts.empty: This group does not has any removed accounts.
default.groups.form.title: Title

default.morefollows.followers_label: …and {count} more {count, plural, one {follower} other {followers}} on remote sites.
default.morefollows.following_label: …and {count} more {count, plural, one {follow} other {follows}} on remote sites.

default.notifications.clear_confirmation: Are you sure you want to permanently clear all your notifications?

default.preferences.hints.demetricator: Decrease social media anxiety by hiding all numbers from the site.

default.privacy.unlisted.long: Do not post to public timelines
default.regeneration_indicator.label: Loading…
default.regeneration_indicator.sublabel: Your home feed is being prepared!
default.registration.lead: With an account on {instance} you"ll be able to follow people on any server in the fediverse.
default.report.block_hint: Do you also want to block this account?
default.report.forward_hint: The account is from another server. Send a copy of the report there as well?
default.report.hint: The report will be sent to your server moderators. You can provide an explanation of why you are reporting this account below:
default.search_popout.tips.full_text: Simple text returns posts you have written, favorited, reposted, or have been mentioned in, as well as matching usernames, display names, and hashtags.
